screen.uicontrol: Open your phone's Today screen, scroll to the bottom and press the "Edit" button.

screen.uicontrol: Tap "Done". Use the Traffic Checker widget to always know the journey time to Home and Work.

screen.uicontrol: We have implemented a workaround for users with unstable Bluetooth connectivity which will enable them to use live services again (TomTom Traffic and Speed Camera Alerts) and to sync content from the MyDrive app.
screen.fn: App Store changelog
App Store changelog

screen.uicontrol: Last Mile Navigation: This is trusted guidance, in-car and then on foot, right to your destination's front door. TomTom GO and TomTom MyDrive are with you, literally, every step of the journey.
screen.fn: Store what's new Last Mile feature message

screen.uicontrol: Find My Car: On your way back? Instead of weighing on your mind, your car's location is saved on your mobile via TomTom GO and TomTom MyDrive.
screen.fn: Store what's new Find My Car feature message

screen.uicontrol: Based on customer feedback, introducing the option to "Avoid Motorways" for fastest routes and the ability to change the unit settings (km, miles).
